Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers, we are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. We hope this aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
